p: To assess the risk of avian influenza A (H7N9) infections in human beings, we developed a two-stage framework ( Fig 1) based on INFORM that focused the stages of A (H7N9) virus transmission from poultry to human: Stage 1, index-case potential, described the transition from poultry to human beings, resulting in an index case; Stage 2, epidemic potential, characterized the subsequent spread of the virus in humans due to co-exposure or sporadic human-human transmission [ 12].
